00041 class Evt_Fire_Weapon: public Event
00042 {
00043 public:
00044         static char const * const gkName;
00045         explicit Evt_Fire_Weapon(ActorId aid)
00046                 : Event( gkName,
00047                                         0,
00048                                         IEventDataPtr(
00049                                                 GCC_NEW EvtData<ActorId>(aid) ) )
00050                 { }
00051 
00052         Evt_Fire_Weapon(std::istrstream &in)
00053                 : Event( gkName )
00054         {
00055                 ActorId aid;
00056                 in >> aid;
00057                 setDataPtr(IEventDataPtr(GCC_NEW EvtData<ActorId>(aid) ) );
00058         }
00059 
00060         virtual void serialize(std::ostrstream &out) const
00061         {
00062                 ActorId aid = getDataPtr<EvtData<ActorId> >()->GetValue();
00063                 out << aid << " ";
00064         }
00065 };

00071 struct EvtData_Thrust : public IEventData
00072 {
00073         explicit EvtData_Thrust( ActorId id, float throttle )
00074                 : m_id(id), 
00075                   m_throttle(throttle)
00076         {}
00077 
00078         ActorId m_id;
00079         float m_throttle;
00080 };

00083 class Evt_Thrust: public Event
00084 {
00085 public:
00086         static char const * const gkName;

00088                 : Event( gkName,
00089                                         0,

00091                                                 GCC_NEW EvtData_Thrust(id, throttle) ) )
00092                 { }
00093

00095                 : Event( gkName )
00096         {
00097                 ActorId aid;
00098                 in >> aid;
00099                 float throttle;
00100                 in >> throttle;
00101                 setDataPtr(IEventDataPtr(GCC_NEW EvtData_Thrust(aid, throttle) ) );
00102         }
00103 
00104         virtual void serialize(std::ostrstream &out) const
00105         {
00106                 EvtData_Thrust *pData = getDataPtr<EvtData_Thrust>();
00107                 out << pData->m_id << " ";
00108                 out << pData->m_throttle << " ";
00109         }
00110 };

00113 struct EvtData_Steer : public IEventData
00114 {
00115         explicit EvtData_Steer( ActorId id, float dir)
00116                 : m_id(id), 
00117                   m_dir(dir)
00118         {}
00119 
00120         ActorId m_id;
00121         float m_dir;            // -1.0 is all the way left, 0 is straight, 1.0 is right
00122 };
00123
